com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class RuleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.RuleController

  • public class RuleController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to Rule
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Salman Ahmad Ansari <10besesansari@seecs.edu.pk>, Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule selectedRule
      An instance of Rule used to store the Rule selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target selectedTarget
      An instance of Target used to store the Target selected by the user from the user interface while updating an existing Rule instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuleController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRule()
      Opens the /Policy Creation/Rule/Add/AddRule.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new Rule instance.
      void cancelUpdateRule()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing Rule instance.
      void deleteRule()
      Deletes an existing Rule instance stored in the database.
      RuleDAO getDaoRule()
      Returns the value of daoRule property.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule> getRuleList()
      Returns the value of ruleList property.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target getRuleTarget(java.lang.Long pkRule)
      Returns the target attribute of the Rule instance corresponding to the pkRule specified by Long argument.
      java.lang.String getRuleTargetString(java.lang.String pkRule)
      Returns the @description attribute of the Target instance associated with a Rule instance corresponding to the pkRule specified by Long argument.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule getSelectedRule()
      Returns the value of selectedRule property.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target getSelectedTarget()
      Returns the value of selectedTarget property.
      boolean isOperationFail()
      Returns FALSE if a Save button was pressed otherwise TRUE.
      void onTargetUnSelect()
      Unselects the already selected Target instance while updating an existing Rule instance.
      void saveUpdateRule()
      Saves the updated value of an existing Rule instance specified by the selectedRule property.
      void setDaoRule(RuleDAO daoRule)
      Sets the daoRule property to the RuleDAO argument.
      void setOperationFail(boolean operationFail)
      Sets the operationFail property to the boolean argument.
      void setRuleList(java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule> ruleList)
      Sets the ruleList property to the ArrayList argument.
      void setSelectedRule(com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Rule selectedRule)
      Sets the selectedRule property to the Rule argument.
      void setSelectedTarget(com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target selectedTarget)
      Sets the selectedTarget property to the Target argument.
      void showUpdateMessage()
      Function showing the confirmation for updation operation
      void updateRule()
      Opens the /Policy Creation/Rule/Update/UpdateRule.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating an existing Rule instance.
